name: MyPretendPal
0:
”Alexa, tell My Pretend Pal I'm a lion.”
”Alexa, tell My Pretend Pal I'm a pig.”
”Alexa, tell My Pretend Pal I'm a monkey.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my pretend pal
des:
Are you a roaring lion?
Are you an oinking pig?
Are you a funky monkey?

For whatever you want to be, My Pretend Pal can help! Just tell My Pretend Pal what you are and you'll instantly have some audio enhancements! There are currently over 30 animals and things you can be, with more on the way!

Don't see what you want to be? Leave a review and request it!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
